sn45.38:4.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you life as a brahmin and the goal of life as a brahmin.
sn45.38:4.4: And what is life as a brahmin?
sn45.38:4.5: It is simply this noble eightfold path, that is:
sn45.38:4.6: right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right samādhi.
sn45.38:4.8: This is called life as a brahmin.
sn45.38:4.9: And what is the goal of life as a brahmin?
sn45.38:4.10: The ending of greed, hate, and delusion.
sn45.38:4.11: This is called the goal of life as a brahmin.”
